title: The Big Bang Theory: Sheldon and Amy's Heartbreaking Moment That Got It Just Right
text:
Published By: Glamour.com Entertainment - Today 
A few days ago on the set of The Big Bang Theory, Mayim Bialik revealed that the show will start examining the stakes for Sheldon and Amy. "...
